description: We're KC's premier shaved ice company serving all across the KC metro and Lawrence.  We are the only mobile shaved ice vendor that allows the customer to flavor their own shaved ice via our patented FLAVORWAVE.  We're at Worlds of Fun / Oceans of Fun, Crown Center and the Schlitterbahn everyday not to mention 100's of personal events every month.  We also carry a selection of ice cream novelty items.  Music - Lights - Fantastic Shaved Ice - Kona Ice$150 minimum
name: Kona Ice KC
